channel.title: ~~~Project Godly-Pkz~~~ Latest update~~~ HUNTER ON 317!~~~~
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/jtmiyv.png[/img] [b]PLEASE NOTE I REMOVED THE CACHE! AND HD MODELS BECUASE I DIDNT LIKE TOO MUCH![/b] This is a Project -i [b]might [/b] one day release- this project's base is ~Allstarscape V2~ if you read this please reply and suggest things i should add! thanks! [u]PICTURES ARE AT BOTTOM[/u] Updates added / Updates already done / Updates almost done
~ Hunter ~ 85% need to add exp. and some more models for it to be complete
~ Godwars ~ 25% done
~ Bounty Hunter~ 100% done (was 97% Finished Pics added!)
~ Whole world Safe execpt for wild ~ 40% done
~ Barbarian Assault ~ 95%
~ Realistic Training ~ 23% UPDATED SEPT.29 (was 10%)
~ Realistic Shops ~ 5%
~ Better Starter Equipment ~ 100%
~ Fight Pits ~ 99% (was 92%)
~ Realistic Home ~ with real home NPC Spawn 99% (Updated Sept. 29 from 10% NPC SPAWN PICS ADDED)
~ All Auto-Spawn! ~ 5% (Just did lumbridge so far!)
~ Warriors Guild ~ 0%
~ Real Skillcape Emotes ~ 0%
~ Real Water ~ 100%
~ Real Pc ~ 0% (prob wont be able to get it perfect because in allstar the mountain thing is missing lol :mad: ~
~ All Godsword Specials! 75% (Need to add armadyl / ill get pics)
~ Adding Quests ~ 0%
~ CastleWars ~ 0%
~ Duel Tourny! ~ 0%
~ All HD Items / Npc's! ~ 30% PICTURES ADDED!
Redone Skills *havent got to skills yet* :eek: [code]~Herblore 0%[/code] [code]~Farming 0%[/code] [code]~Woodcutting 0%[/code] [code]~Mining 0%[/code] [code]~Slayer 0%[/code] [code]~FireMaking 0%[/code] [code]~Cooking 0%[/code] ~why do those skills need redoing?~ ~herblore~ you get exp from a chest... im going to make it realistic ~Farming~ you plant a torstial seed or whatever(which tbh i think is fine) but im goanna amke it so you can plant at catherby and any farming spot. ~Woodcutting~ You get money from a tree... not realistic at all ill be working on getting logs from it! ~Mining~ You get money from a rock... ill be adding Tin,Copper,Iron,Coal,Mithril,Adamant,Rune,Rune essence. ~Slayer~ you get exp from a chest... ill be making it so you get exp when you kill monsters! / Slayer tasks? ~Firemaking~ you get it from a chest? and you get money from it and arrows?... ill be making it so you cut logs and burn them with tinderbox to start fires! ~Cooking~ sometimes your not aloud to cook sharks mantas etc.?... ill be fixing that as well! [b]~Pictures~[/b] [u]Got one picture so far and its of home[/u] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/30ng5l2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2uq0sar.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/140hi4x.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/6y1st1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2itmqhe.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/1zgpyxt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2emzr5c.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2lxjh3r.jpg[/img] [b]INCASE YOU DIDNT GET A GOOD LOOK AT HD MODELS IM MAKING CLOSE UPS[/b] :D [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/fjg4cl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/fm18ar.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2qm3plv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/11k9kt5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2hg4u1u.jpg[/img] More will come as time goes by! and i gotta go school so ill add more after school and after basketball practice=P Credits:
-Me-
-SilentCj-for the gs stances-
-Warlock999 for moving water-
-some guy from google for some models- (customs not the hd i looked in datmaker and did myself)
-My friend for telling me i should try to make a good source based from allstarscape-
-Who ever made "crapper cache something something something" ill get name i hope!-
Chosen angels owner -Briatin- (i think) "chosen angels v2"
-Date- September 28,2009 9:19PM -Put up by Owner Mike (Qoodscape)

@qoodscape wrote:

jtmiyv.png1096×158

PLEASE NOTE I REMOVED THE CACHE! AND HD MODELS BECUASE I DIDNT LIKE TOO MUCH!
This is a Project -i might one day release-
this project’s base is ~Allstarscape V2~
if you read this please reply and suggest things i should add! thanks!
PICTURES ARE AT BOTTOM

Updates added / Updates already done / Updates almost done

~ Hunter ~ 85% need to add exp. and some more models for it to be complete
~ Godwars ~ 25% done
~ Bounty Hunter~ 100% done (was 97% Finished Pics added!)
~ Whole world Safe execpt for wild ~ 40% done

~ Realistic Shops ~ 5%
~ Better Starter Equipment ~ 100%
~ Fight Pits ~ 99% (was 92%)
~ Realistic Home ~ with real home NPC Spawn 99% (Updated Sept. 29 from 10% NPC SPAWN PICS ADDED)

~ Warriors Guild ~ 0%
~ Real Skillcape Emotes ~ 0%
~ Real Water ~ 100%
~ Real Pc ~ 0% (prob wont be able to get it perfect because in allstar the mountain thing is missing lol :mad: ~
~ All Godsword Specials! 75% (Need to add armadyl / ill get pics)
~ Adding Quests ~ 0%
~ CastleWars ~ 0%
~ Duel Tourny! ~ 0%
~ All HD Items / Npc's! ~ 30% PICTURES ADDED!

Redone Skills havent got to skills yet :eek:

~Herblore 0%
~Farming 0%
~Woodcutting 0%
~Mining 0%
~Slayer 0%
~FireMaking 0%
~Cooking 0%

~why do those skills need redoing?~

~herblore~
you get exp from a chest… im going to make it realistic
~Farming~
you plant a torstial seed or whatever(which tbh i think is fine) but im goanna amke it so you can plant at catherby and any farming spot.
~Woodcutting~
You get money from a tree… not realistic at all ill be working on getting logs from it!
~Mining~
You get money from a rock… ill be adding Tin,Copper,Iron,Coal,Mithril,Adamant,Rune,Rune essence.
~Slayer~
you get exp from a chest… ill be making it so you get exp when you kill monsters! / Slayer tasks?
~Firemaking~
you get it from a chest? and you get money from it and arrows?.. ill be making it so you cut logs and burn them with tinderbox to start fires!
~Cooking~
sometimes your not aloud to cook sharks mantas etc.?.. ill be fixing that as well!

~Pictures~
